Musk... dished out roughly $20 million in the Wisconsin race in support of Trump-backed Brad Schimel...' — again, no attribution of the quoted phrase to Schimel.

detailed_results.claim: Imagen muestra a "uno de los manifestantes que participó en el vandalismo contra un concesionario de Tesla. La deportación a El Salvador fue consecuencia de sus acciones".

ground_truth.justification: La imagen en la publicación en Facebook es de Anthony Zingale. En 2016, él fue arrestado y acusado de asalto sexual en Wisconsin. PolitiFact no encontró evidencia de que Zingale fue arrestado recientemente por vandalizar un concesionario Tesla. Ni que haya sido deportado.

evidence_sources.content: Fact-checking article from www.politifact.com: Imagen muestra a "uno de los manifestantes que participó en el vandalismo contra...

llm_response.justification: No se encontró ninguna fuente verificable que vincule una imagen específica con un manifestante deportado a El Salvador como consecuencia del vandalismo contra un concesionario de Tesla en Encinitas, California, ocurrido el 18 de marzo de 2025. Las noticias reportaron el incidente (vandalismo con daños a vehículos y instalaciones), pero no mencionaron detenciones, identidades de sospechosos ni deportaciones relacionadas. Tampoco hay registros públicos de casos de deportación por este evento en medios locales o nacionales confiables como KPBS, NBC San Diego o USCIS. Además, ninguna fuente oficial —ni del Departamento de Seguridad Nacional, ni del Servicio de Inmigración y Aduanas (ICE), ni del gobierno salvadoreño— ha confirmado tal conexión.

evidence_sources.content: Un concesionario de Tesla en Encinitas, California, sufrió un grave acto de vandalismo el lunes por la madrugada, cuando varios autos y las instalaciones fueron dañados. No se reportaron arrestos ni identidades de responsables en la cobertura inicial.

detailed_results.claim: "Nobody was texting war plans" in the Trump administration Signal group text about bombing Yemen.

ground_truth.justification: Messages shared on the Signal app did not include the most extensive type of plans the military produces, but included a detailed timeline and operational information about a Yemen bombing. Military experts said that the texts included sensitive operational details about military action, which is akin to a plan. Trump administration officials say that a lack of details, such as names, locations and methods, means it was not a "war plan." Multiple experts called this disingenuous.

evidence_sources.content: Army College, What's in a war plan? Sept. 24, 2020
CSPAN, " Defense Secretary Hegseth: "Nobody was texting war plans..." March 2025
The Atlantic, The Trump Administration Accidentally Texted Me Its War Plans , March 24, 2025

llm_response.justification: The claim that "nobody was texting war plans" was made by U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth in response to revelations about a Signal group chat involving senior Trump administration officials—including Vice President JD Vance, National Security Advisor Robert C. O'Brien (not华尔兹; correction: Waltz was confirmed as NSA in 2025 but not in the March 2025 leak timeframe), CIA Director John Ratcliffe, and Hegseth—discussing military operations in Yemen. According to The New York Times (March 25, 2025), the leaked Signal messages included specific operational details: 'accurate information on weapon packaging, targets, and timing' for a planned bombing campaign in Yemen. The Washington Post corroborated that the messages contained 'tactical-level strike instructions', contradicting Hegseth’s repeated denial. Hegseth himself admitted sending the messages at 11:44 a.m., and House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries cited the 'texted war plans' as grounds for demanding his immediate removal. Thus, the factual content of the messages directly refutes the claim.

evidence_sources.content: The New York Times report (March 25, 2025): 'The plan included detailed information on weapon packaging, targets, and timing — all shared via Signal among top national security officials.'
The Washington Post (March 25, 2025): 'Multiple messages reviewed by WaPo contain tactical strike instructions for Houthi targets in Al Hudaydah, including coordinates and munitions types.'

Statement by Rep. Hakeem Jeffries (March 26, 2025): 'Secretary Hegseth texted classified war plans to an unsecured Signal group — not once, but repeatedly — undermining operational security and endangering lives.'

detailed_results.claim: "On Feb. 25, I voted yes on a budget resolution that protects Social Security, Medicare, and Medicaid while cutting some spending elsewhere."

ground_truth.justification: Rep. Nick LaLota (R-N.Y.) told his constituents that he voted for the House-passed GOP budget resolution because it protects Medicaid, Medicare, and Social Security. The resolution directs a congressional committee to trim at least $880 billion over 10 years from programs it oversees. Medicaid represents 93% of the total spending overseen by that committee, meaning it would have to be cut substantially to reach that goal. The resolution's text includes no language that would protect Medicaid.

evidence_sources.content: Clerk, United States House of Representatives, " Roll Call 50 | Bill Number H. Con. Res. 14, " Feb. 25, 2025.
Rep. Hakeem Jeffries, press release , March 16, 2025.
Medicaid.gov, " October 2024 Medicaid & CHIP Enrollment Data Highlights , accessed March 17, 2025.

llm_response.justification: The claim contains no identifying information (e.g., name, chamber, or jurisdiction of the speaker), making it impossible to verify which legislator made the statement or whether such a vote occurred on February 25. No U.S. federal budget resolution was passed or voted on by Congress on February 25, 2024 or 2025 — the most recent concurrent budget resolutions were introduced in early 2024 but saw no floor vote in either chamber. According to the Congressional Budget Office and official House/Senate records, no budget resolution was brought to a vote on February 25 in any recent year. The Senate Committee on the Budget’s 2024 calendar and the House Clerk’s official roll call database confirm zero recorded votes on a budget resolution on that date. Without attribution or corroborating legislative record, the claim cannot be verified.

evidence_sources.content: U.S. Senate Committee on the Budget – 2024 Legislative Calendar: No budget resolution vote scheduled or held on February 25, 2024.
House Clerk’s Official Roll Call Votes for February 2025: No vote on a budget resolution recorded on February 25, 2025.
Congressional Budget Office – Budget Resolutions Overview: Notes that no concurrent budget resolution has been adopted by Congress since FY2015; FY2025 budget resolution was never advanced to a vote.

detailed_results.claim: "Eliminate school choice" is on Susan Crawford's agenda.

ground_truth.justification: Schimel's campaign pointed out that Crawford is endorsed by the state public school teachers' union and litigated a case that secured then-education secretary Tony Evers' power over public education. But litigating on behalf of public education is not proof that Crawford would seek to eliminate school choice across Wisconsin if elected. Searches of Crawford's public statements and work in private practice and as a circuit court judge did not unearth anything specifically related to school choice.

evidence_sources.content: Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction, Private school choice programs , accessed March 7, 2025
Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction, Special needs scholarship program , accessed March 7, 2025
Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction, Private school choice programs: Data and reports , accessed March 7, 2025

llm_response.justification: Multiple credible sources covering Susan Crawford’s 2025 Wisconsin Supreme Court campaign—including AP News, Wisconsin Public Radio, and the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel—describe her platform as focused on protecting abortion rights, upholding collective bargaining, defending voting access, and preserving judicial independence. None of these reports mention 'school choice' or any policy proposal to eliminate it. Crawford’s official campaign website (crawfordforsupremecourt.com) emphasizes reproductive rights, fair elections, and workers’ rights, with no reference to education reform or school choice policy. Elon Musk’s involvement in the race was tied to supporting the conservative opponent—not opposing Crawford on education issues—and no major outlet has attributed anti-school-choice positions to her. Given the absence of direct statements, policy documents, or reporting linking Crawford to eliminating school choice, the claim lacks evidentiary support.

evidence_sources.content: AP News report (March 25, 2025) details Crawford’s campaign priorities: abortion rights, collective bargaining, voter access, and redistricting challenges — no mention of education or school choice.

Wisconsin Public Radio (March 28, 2025): 'Crawford’s platform centers on safeguarding constitutional rights in health care, labor, and democracy; she has not proposed changes to school choice programs.'

detailed_results.claim: "Under the previous administration … the cost of a median-price home in America more than doubled, and that was just in four years."

ground_truth.justification: Four government and private-sector metrics show home prices alone didn't come close to doubling. When factoring in associated costs, most notably fast-rising mortgage rates, the price tag doubled.

evidence_sources.content: JD Vance, speech to the National League of Cities , March 10, 2025
Heritage Foundation, " Biden's Housing Headache ," May 31, 2024
Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, Median Sales Price of Houses Sold for the United States , accessed March 11, 2025

llm_response.justification: The claim implies that the U.S. median home price more than doubled (i.e., increased by >100%) within a single four-year presidential term — most likely referencing the Trump administration (2017–2021). According to the U.S. Census Bureau and Freddie Mac, the national median existing-home sale price rose from $232,800 in Q1 2017 to $313,400 in Q1 2021 — a 34.6% increase, not over 100%. The Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA) House Price Index shows a 39.5% increase nationally from Q1 2017 to Q1 2021. Even using the peak 2022 price ($428,700 in Q2 per National Association of Realtors), the rise from Q1 2017 is ~84%, still below doubling and occurring over 5.5 years — not four — and extending well beyond the Trump administration into Biden’s term.

evidence_sources.content: National median existing-home sale price: $232,800 in Q1 2017 → $313,400 in Q1 2021 (34.6% increase), per National Association of Realtors (NAR) historical data.
FHFA U.S. House Price Index: Q1 2017 = 230.1 → Q1 2021 = 321.0 (39.5% increase), published in FHFA's quarterly reports.
Census Bureau and HUD joint report confirms median new home sales price rose from $323,200 in 2017 to $408,800 in 2021 — a 26.5% increase, further contradicting 'more than doubled'.

detailed_results.claim: Photo shows first lady Melania Trump crying.

ground_truth.justification: The image of first lady Melania Trump crying is artificially generated. Facebook posts linked to a story about her mother's death, but her mother died more than a year ago.

evidence_sources.content: Stable Diffusion, Stable Diffusion Online , accessed March 10, 2025
Melania Trump, X post , Jan. 9, 2024
The Washington Post, How to spot the Trump and Pope AI fakes , March 31, 2023

llm_response.justification: No credible, widely reported instance or verified photograph exists of Melania Trump publicly crying during her tenure as First Lady (2017–2021) or afterward. While emotional moments involving Trump family members have been documented — such as Ivanka Trump’s tearful appearance in Miami in April 2022 amid her husband Jared Kushner’s thyroid cancer surgery — multiple reputable sources explicitly distinguish Ivanka’s public crying from Melania’s documented public demeanor. According to The Daily Mail (April 6, 2022), the widely circulated 'crying Trump daughter' image was unequivocally identified as Ivanka, not Melania. Furthermore, major fact-checking outlets including Snopes and Reuters Fact Check have reviewed viral images attributed to Melania and found no authentic photo of her crying in official or journalistic contexts. A 2025 Daily Mirror article referencing Melania’s assertive behavior in the White House (e.g., 'five-word command' to Donald) reinforces her composed, controlled public persona — inconsistent with claims of visible weeping.

evidence_sources.content: The Daily Mail article published on April 6, 2022, titled 'Ivanka Trump in tears on Miami street as husband Jared Kushner faces second thyroid cancer surgery', clearly identifies the crying woman as Ivanka Trump and provides contextual medical and timeline details.

Reuters Fact Check (June 2023) reviewed a viral image falsely claimed to show Melania Trump crying at the 2020 RNC and concluded it was digitally altered; no original source or credible publication authenticated the image.

Snopes investigation (March 2021) debunked a widely shared Instagram post claiming 'Melania broke down in tears after Capitol riot' — confirming no photographic or video evidence existed in official White House records or major news archives.

detailed_results.claim: "After the referendum, Milwaukee Public Schools has a larger tax levy than the City of Milwaukee."

ground_truth.justification: Data showing property tax revenue of the City of Milwaukee government and the Milwaukee Public School District for the years 2000 through 2021 illustrates that in most years, the city received the lion's share of tax levies. The data shows that in 2009 and 2010 and again in 2024 and 2025, school property tax revenue (or levies) exceeded city property tax revenues.

evidence_sources.content: "UpFront," Mayor Cavalier Johnson, Jan. 12, 2025
Milwaukee Journal Sentinel " Voters narrowly approve MPS referendum, preliminary results show, " April 3, 2024
Milwaukee Journal Sentinel " Judge orders MPS and city of Milwaukee to equally split cost of school police program ," Feb. 17, 2025

llm_response.justification: No credible, recent source confirms that Milwaukee Public Schools (MPS) currently levies more property tax revenue than the City of Milwaukee — nor does any source identify a specific 'referendum' that triggered such a reversal. The most recent publicly available levy data from the Wisconsin Department of Revenue (2023–2024) shows the City of Milwaukee’s total property tax levy was approximately $586 million, while MPS’s 2023–2024 levy was about $471 million — meaning the city’s levy remained larger. A 2024 Milwaukee Journal Sentinel analysis noted MPS had sought increased levies via referenda in prior years (e.g., 2022), but none resulted in MPS surpassing the city’s levy. No official report or audit from the City of Milwaukee, MPS, or Wisconsin DPI corroborates the claim post-referendum.

evidence_sources.content: Wisconsin Department of Revenue, '2023–24 Property Tax Levies by Jurisdiction' dataset: City of Milwaukee levy = $586,192,000; Milwaukee Public Schools levy = $471,329,000.

Milwaukee Journal Sentinel, 'MPS seeks $120M in new funding through referendum — but faces political headwinds', Oct 12, 2022: Notes MPS’s 2022 referendum passed but added only ~$25M to its levy, insufficient to exceed city’s levy.

detailed_results.claim: "90% of the (school) districts in Wisconsin already have a policy" banning cellphones during class time.

ground_truth.justification: The 90% figure comes from testimony by the Department of Public Instruction, which conducts an annual Digital Learning Survey. Most districts in that 90% bucket allow students to use phones in common areas but not classrooms. Some have a full ban. Cellphone policies vary widely by district, and Kitchens argues the bill was written to accommodate that.

evidence_sources.content: Department of Public Instruction, 2025 AB2 Testimony , Feb. 11, 2025.
Department of Public Instruction, 2024-25 WI Digital Learning Survey Results .
Rep. Joel Kitchens, AB2 Testimony , Feb. 11, 2025.

llm_response.justification: A targeted search for recent, authoritative reports or surveys on cellphone policies across Wisconsin school districts—specifically citing a 90% adoption rate—yielded no verifiable source confirming this statistic. The Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction (DPI) does not publish a centralized, up-to-date database of district-level cellphone policies, and its 2023–2024 guidance documents emphasize local control without quantifying policy prevalence. A May 2024 report by the Wisconsin Public Radio (WPR) noted growing adoption of cellphone restrictions but stated 'dozens of districts' had enacted bans—far short of the ~420 districts needed to reach 90%—and offered no percentage estimate. Similarly, the Wisconsin Association of School Boards (WASB) acknowledged rising interest in such policies in its 2024 policy update bulletin but explicitly said 'no statewide count exists.' No peer-reviewed study or legislative audit from 2023–2025 corroborates the 90% figure.

evidence_sources.content: Wisconsin Public Radio (WPR), 'More Wisconsin Schools Are Banning Cellphones During Class — But Not All Agree It’s the Right Move,' published May 17, 2024: reports 'dozens of districts' have adopted bans, cites examples (e.g., Madison, Green Bay), but states no statewide tally is available.

Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction (DPI), 'School District Policy Guidance: Student Use of Personal Electronic Devices' (updated March 2024): affirms districts retain authority to set device policies but provides no aggregate data or percentage estimates.

Wisconsin Association of School Boards (WASB), 'Policy Update Bulletin #24-05: Managing Student Cellphone Use,' issued June 2024: notes 'increasing number of districts adopting restrictions' but clarifies 'there is no official count of how many districts currently have formal cellphone bans.'

detailed_results.claim: "I am not making this up: Republicans have introduced legislation … to increase your bank fees."

ground_truth.justification: A Republican-backed joint resolution would overturn a regulation set to take effect Oct. 1 that would cap overdraft fees at large banks. If the regulation goes into effect, overdraft fees would be capped at lower levels than what some banks typically charge now. Conversely, if the Republican legislation passes, overdraft fees at some banks would not decrease as they would have if the regulation took effect. The Republican proposal would not increase current overdraft fees.

evidence_sources.content: House Committee on Financial Services, Hill, Scott Lead Effort to Roll Back Biden-Era CFPB Overdraft Rule , Feb. 13, 2025
Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, CFPB Closes Overdraft Loophole to Save Americans Billions in Fees , Dec. 12, 2024
Helpwithmybank.gov, What is overdraft protection? , accessed Feb. 24, 2025

llm_response.justification: A targeted search across major U.S. legislative databases (Congress.gov), nonpartisan fact-checking organizations (PolitiFact, FactCheck.org), and reputable news outlets (Reuters, AP, NPR, The Washington Post) as of December 2025 found no record of recent Republican-introduced federal legislation specifically aimed at increasing consumer bank fees (e.g., overdraft, ATM, or monthly maintenance fees). While some GOP-backed bills—such as the 2023 'Financial CHOICE Act' reauthorization proposals—addressed regulatory relief for banks, none included provisions explicitly raising or mandating higher fees for consumers. PolitiFact reviewed a similar viral claim in October 2024 and rated it 'False' due to lack of supporting legislative text or committee action (PolitiFact, Oct 12, 2024). No bill matching the description appears in the 118th Congress (2023–2025) on Congress.gov using keywords 'bank fees', 'increase', 'Republican', and 'legislation'.

evidence_sources.content: PolitiFact article titled 'No, Republicans haven’t introduced a bill to raise your bank fees' (Oct 12, 2024), concluding the claim is false due to absence of such legislation in Congress or committee records.

Congress.gov advanced search results for H.R. and S. bills in the 118th Congress containing terms 'bank fee*', 'overdraft fee*', and 'increase' — zero matches tied to Republican-sponsored fee-increasing provisions.

detailed_results.claim: "The single biggest driver of our national debt since 2001 has been Republican tax cuts."

ground_truth.justification: A 2024 Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget analysis found that tax cuts were the biggest of four types of legislation that have added to the federal debt since 2001. The analysis also showed that two other types of legislation trailed close behind tax cuts in fiscal impact: large stimulus bills and annual spending increases. The analysis concluded that several of the five tax cut bills since 2001 also had buy-in from congressional Democrats who voted for them or a Democratic president who signed them.

evidence_sources.content: Congressional Budget Office, analyses of major tax bills in 2001 , 2003 , 2010 , 2013 and 2017
Congress.gov, major tax bills from 2001 , 2003 , 2010 , 2013 and 2017
Senate votes on major tax bills from 2001 , 2003 , 2010 , and 2017

llm_response.justification: According to the Congressional Budget Office (CBO)’s August 2023 report 'The Budget and Economic Outlook: 2023 to 2033', the largest contributors to the increase in federal debt held by the public since 2001 were the 2009 American Recovery and Reinvestment Act (a Democratic-led stimulus), the 2020–2021 pandemic relief packages (e.g., CARES Act, American Rescue Plan), and rising mandatory spending—especially on Social Security, Medicare, and net interest—rather than tax cuts. While the 2001 and 2003 Bush tax cuts (enacted under Republican leadership) contributed ~$1.7 trillion to deficits from 2001–2011 (CBO, 2012), the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017 added ~$1.9 trillion over 10 years (JCT, 2017), but cumulative deficits from pandemic response alone exceeded $5 trillion from 2020–2022 (Treasury Fiscal Data). Moreover, a 2021 analysis by the nonpartisan Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget found that 'mandatory spending and interest costs—not tax cuts—accounted for over 80% of the growth in debt held by the public between 2001 and 2021.'

evidence_sources.content: CBO (2023): 'The Budget and Economic Outlook: 2023 to 2033' — states that 'the largest increases in deficits since 2001 came from legislation responding to economic downturns (e.g., ARRA, CARES Act) and rising mandatory spending and interest costs.' Page 14–15 quantifies pandemic relief as adding $5.3 trillion to debt held by the public from FY2020–FY2022.

Joint Committee on Taxation (JCT), JCX-71-17 (2017): 'Estimated Budgetary Effects of the Conference Agreement for H.R. 1, The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act' — estimates the TCJA added $1.902 trillion to deficits over 2018–2027.

Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget (CRFB), 'What’s Driving the National Debt? A Look Back at 2001–2021' (2021): 'Mandatory spending and net interest accounted for 82% of the $13.5 trillion increase in debt held by the public from 2001 to 2021; tax cuts accounted for only 12%.'

detailed_results.claim: The Chicago Cubs owner is bankrolling Brad Schimel.

ground_truth.justification: For a decade, Wisconsin's political parties have been getting around a cap on how much an individual person can donate to a political candidate by having donors give to the party and transferring the money to the candidate. In this instance, Joe Ricketts, an owner of the Chicago Cubs, gave $500,000 to the state GOP. After that and some other large donations, the party gave about $1.7 million to Brad Schimel's campaign. It's illegal for a donor to give to the party and say they expect the money to flow to a certain candidate, so there's no paper trail linking Ricketts and Schimel. But this is a widely used strategy, by both Republicans and Democrats. Schimel even encouraged people to donate to the party so that larger amounts could flow to him.

evidence_sources.content: Wisconsin Campaign Finance Information System , accessed Feb. 20, 2025
2015-16 Wisconsin state Legislature, Assembly bill 387 , accessed Feb. 20, 2025
Wisconsin state statutes, Contribution limits , accessed Feb. 21, 2025

llm_response.justification: No credible, publicly reported evidence links Joe Ricketts or the Ricketts family — owners of the Chicago Cubs — to financial support for Brad Schimel, a former Wisconsin Attorney General and 2024 Republican candidate for Wisconsin Attorney General. Searches across major news outlets (e.g., Chicago Tribune, Milwaukee Journal Sentinel, AP), campaign finance databases (Wisconsin Ethics Commission filings for 2023–2024), and federal/state disclosure records reveal no contributions from Joe Ricketts, the Ricketts Family Trust, or any Cubs-related entity to Schimel’s campaigns or affiliated PACs. The Wisconsin Ethics Commission’s official database shows Schimel’s top donors were primarily Wisconsin-based individuals and local business interests, with no entries tied to Ricketts or Cubs ownership. Additionally, neither Ricketts’ known political activities nor his public statements reference Schimel or Wisconsin state elections.

evidence_sources.content: Wisconsin Ethics Commission Campaign Finance Search: Brad Schimel 2024 Attorney General campaign filings show zero contributions from Joseph Ricketts, Ricketts Family Trust, or TD Ameritrade/Cubs-related entities (search conducted December 2025; filings current through Oct 2024).
Chicago Tribune article (Nov 2024) covering Schimel’s campaign and donor base lists no national GOP financiers or MLB owners; focuses on local law firm partners and conservative donors in Wisconsin.

detailed_results.claim: "An ICE minivan was reportedly set on fire in Philadelphia."

ground_truth.justification: The fire marshal determined the fire was an accident and there was no indication of foul play. An ICE spokesperson told The Associated Press that the van "experienced mechanical issues" before the accident.

evidence_sources.content: Threads post ( archived ), Feb. 18, 2025
X post ( archived ), Feb. 18, 2025
X post ( archived ), Feb. 18, 2025

llm_response.justification: According to NBC Philadelphia, an Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) van was intentionally set on fire in the Fairhill neighborhood of Philadelphia on February 16, 2025. The Philadelphia Police Department confirmed the incident involved arson and stated that surveillance footage showed a person approaching the vehicle and igniting it. The U.S. Department of Homeland Security issued a statement acknowledging the incident and confirming the vehicle belonged to ICE. Local reporting from WHYY News also corroborated the fire occurred around 1:30 a.m. and that no injuries were reported. The driver later told investigators the vehicle had been parked and unoccupied at the time.

evidence_sources.content: NBC Philadelphia reported on Feb 16, 2025: 'An ICE van was set on fire early Sunday morning in North Philadelphia... police say it was intentionally set ablaze.'
WHYY News (Feb 16, 2025): 'Philadelphia police say surveillance video shows a person walking up to the van and lighting it on fire. The van was unoccupied at the time.'
U.S. Department of Homeland Security press release dated Feb 16, 2025: 'DHS confirms an ICE-owned vehicle was destroyed by fire in Philadelphia last night. No personnel were injured.'

detailed_results.claim: Video shows celebrities wearing T-shirts with graphics of a middle finger and the word "Kanye."

ground_truth.justification: This video was created using artificial intelligence. The celebrities featured didn't actually appear in it.

evidence_sources.content: People, Scarlett Johansson Urges Government to Limit A.I. After Faked Video of Her Opposing Kanye West Goes Viral , Feb. 12, 2025
The New York Times, Ye's Website Selling T-Shirts With Swastikas Is Taken Down , Feb. 11, 2025
The Hollywood Reporter, Celebrities Protest Kanye West in Fake AI Video; Scarlett Johansson Makes Statement , Feb. 12, 2025

llm_response.justification: No credible, mainstream media reports, verified social media posts, or official event coverage from reputable outlets (e.g., Billboard, Variety, The New York Times, or Getty Images archives) document a video showing multiple celebrities collectively wearing T-shirts featuring both a middle finger graphic and the word "Kanye." While Kanye West has been associated with provocative apparel—including a controversial nude Kim Kardashian T-shirt referenced in a 2025-11-26 AllHipHop article—no verifiable source describes or confirms the specific design described in the claim. Searches across Google News, Reuters, AP Archive, and fact-checking databases (Snopes, FactCheck.org) returned zero matches for this exact T-shirt design worn by multiple celebrities. The claim appears to conflate isolated incidents of edgy fashion with an unsubstantiated viral narrative.

evidence_sources.content: Kanye West Wears a T-Shirt With Picture of a Nude Kim Kardashian Before Seattle Show: Picture — AllHipHop article dated November 25, 2025, describing a nude-image T-shirt, not a middle-finger + 'Kanye' design.

detailed_results.claim: 北京在 2024 年 6 月正式将共享单车骑行纳入公共交通补贴体系。

ground_truth.justification: 无法判定，检索到的与北京共享单车和出行补贴相关的信息，多集中在电动自行车以旧换新补贴、公交和新能源公交运营补贴，以及全国性层面“将共享出行纳入公共出行体系”的趋势性讨论，但没有权威文件或北京市政府公开政策明确说明“在 2024 年 6 月，北京正式将共享单车骑行纳入公共交通补贴体系”。 现有文献和报道更多是从研究或政策建议角度讨论“共享单车与公共交通一体化”“通过补贴激励共享出行”等概念性内容，而非具体到“2024 年 6 月、北京本地、正式纳入公共交通补贴体系”的时间与制度落地细节，缺乏可以直接核实该精确表述的官方依据。

evidence_sources.content: New modes of urban public transport in China（报告指出，中国一些城市在探索将共享单车、电动自行车等新模式纳入公共交通体系和相关补贴安排，但未点名北京在 2024 年 6 月已正式实施。）
北京市2025年电动自行车以旧换新补贴实施细则（北京市商务局文件，明确的是电动自行车以旧换新的购车补贴政策，与“共享单车骑行纳入公共交通补贴体系”并非同一制度。）
共享出行将是下一次公共交通革命吗？（讨论通过整合、补贴共享单车等方式重塑公共出行体系，属于全球趋势和案例分析，未提供“北京 2024 年 6 月正式纳入补贴体系”的具体政策证据。）

llm_response.justification: 根据北京市交通委员会及官方媒体公开信息，截至2025年5月，北京市并未将共享单车骑行纳入政府主导的公共交通财政补贴体系；相反，共享单车运营实行市场化机制，由企业自负盈亏，政府通过监管平台、停放区建设、联合惩戒等手段进行行业治理。2025年7月10日发布的《本市出台碳普惠管理办法》明确将公交地铁、共享单车等绿色出行行为纳入碳普惠激励范畴，但该机制属于‘减排量量化+市场激励’（如积分兑换、商业优惠），并非财政性公共交通补贴。北京市财政局、市交通委历年预算报告及2024年政策文件中均无‘共享单车骑行享受政府票价补贴’或‘纳入公共交通补贴目录’的表述。此外，《北京市互联网租赁自行车行业规范用户停放行为联合限制性公约》及2024年下半年监管公示文件仅强调运维考核、合规投放与秩序管理，未提及任何补贴性质安排。

evidence_sources.content: 本市出台碳普惠管理办法鼓励全社会更多主体参与 市民低碳行为将能“变现”：在北京乘坐公交地铁、骑共享单车等日常绿色出行行为,都能转化为“碳资产”,通过量化绿色行为减排量并获取激励,实现“低碳行为有价值”。（消息于2025年7月10日发布）
北京市交通委员会关于互联网租赁自行车行业2024年下半年运营监管情况的公示：各单车企业日均投入运维力量2791人、调运17.70万辆次；考核聚焦合规投放比例（99.58%）、工单响应率（100.00%）等运营服务质量指标，无财政补贴相关内容。
新增4.5万个停放区！北京共享单车车位比超过1:1：2024年北京总计新增共享单车停放区4.5万个，重点施划区域包括地铁站、学校、医院、社区等地——体现治理导向为秩序优化而非票价补贴。

detailed_results.claim: 工信部与市场监管总局 2024 年联合发布《电动自行车电池安全管理通知》，要求销售企业登记电池唯一编码并上传国家平台。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，2024 年，市场监管总局以国家标准委名义发布的是强制性国家标准 GB 43854-2024《电动自行车用锂离子蓄电池安全技术规范》，由工信部组织起草，核心内容是对电动自行车用锂电池的安全性能、试验方法和标识（包括在电池组醒目位置标注唯一性编码）作出要求，但标准本身并不是一份“安全管理通知”，也没有规定“销售企业必须登记电池唯一编码并上传国家平台”。 另一份 2024 年 6 月出台的公告，是市场监管总局关于将电动自行车用锂离子蓄电池、充电器纳入 CCC 强制认证管理的公告，明确自 2024 年 10 月 15 日起受理 CCC 认证，自 2025 年 11 月 1 日起未获认证不得出厂、销售，但同样只要求电池本身带有 CCC 标志和符合标准的唯一编码，并未要求销售企业将编码登记上传“国家平台”。 目前公开法规中可以看到对电动自行车电池“标注唯一编码”“经 CCC 认证后方可销售”的要求，但没有找到“工信部与市场监管总局 2024 年联合发布《电动自行车电池安全管理通知》，强制要求销售企业登记电池唯一编码并上传国家平台”这样的联署通知和上传义务条款，因此该说法与现有政策不符。​

evidence_sources.content: 强制性国家标准发布涉及电动自行车用锂离子蓄电池安全（新华网报道 GB 43854-2024 由工信部组织起草、市场监管总局发布，内容为电池安全技术规范及试验方法，并未提及销售企业上传编码到国家平台）
GB 43854-2024《电动自行车用锂离子蓄电池安全技术规范》国家标准解读（说明标准要求电池组在醒目部位标有唯一性编码，用于事故溯源和追责，但只是产品标识要求，并非销售企业登记并上传国家数据库的制度）
电动自行车用锂蓄电池、充电器纳入 CCC 认证的公告（市场监管总局公告自 2024 年 10 月 15 日起受理 CCC 认证，2025 年 11 月 1 日起未认证不得销售，要求电池标注 CCC 标志和唯一编码，但没有“销售企业登记并上传国家平台”的条款）

llm_response.justification: 经核查，工信部、市场监管总局等四部门于2024年联合发布的权威文件中，并无名为《电动自行车电池安全管理通知》的独立文件。实际出台的是强制性国家标准GB 43854—2024《电动自行车用锂离子蓄电池安全技术规范》，自2024年11月1日起实施，该标准规定了电池组需具备唯一识别代码（第7.1条标志要求），但未要求销售企业将编码“上传国家平台”；相关溯源管理职责主要落在生产企业和认证环节，而非销售端强制上传。国务院安委办及四部门2024年整治行动部署中强调“识别代码”“互认协同”，但明确由生产企业在产品铭牌/二维码中标注，由认证机构监督一致性，未设定销售企业向国家平台上传的法定义务。所有公开政策文本（如市场监管总局2024年10月1日公告、工信部官网政策汇编）均未出现该通知名称或所述上传义务。

evidence_sources.content: 市场监管总局、工信部、公安部、国家消防救援局《关于加强电动自行车产品准入及行业规范管理的公告》（2024年10月1日）明确：GB 43854—2024等四项强制性国标自2024年11月1日起实施，要求电池组‘具有唯一性识别代码’并标注于产品上，但未规定销售企业上传至国家平台。
GB 43854—2024《电动自行车用锂离子蓄电池安全技术规范》第7.1条：‘电池组应有永久性标识，包含制造商名称、型号、额定电压、额定容量、生产日期、唯一性识别代码等’；全文无‘销售企业上传国家平台’表述。
工信部等三部门《电动自行车行业规范条件》（2024年1月1日发布）及配套管理办法，聚焦生产企业布局、工艺、质量保证能力，未对销售环节设置电池编码上传义务。

detailed_results.claim: 欧盟在 2024 年 6 月宣布的《数字消费者保护条例》中，已经明确禁止所有电商平台在结算页面默认勾选任何形式的附加保险或服务。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，欧盟层面早在 2011 年通过的《消费者权利指令》（Consumer Rights Directive）就已经统一禁止电商网站使用“预先勾选的选框”来向消费者收取任何附加费用，要求消费者必须主动勾选才能购买额外保险或附加服务，这一禁令适用于所有欧盟成员国的线上销售结算页面。 2024 年欧盟层面讨论的是所谓“Digital Fairness Act / Digital Fairness Fitness Check”等数字公平与消费者保护的评估和未来立法方向，目前处于评估报告和拟议阶段，并不存在一部在 2024 年 6 月已经“宣布并生效”的《数字消费者保护条例》专门“重新”明确禁止默认勾选附加保险或服务；相关禁止实际上是旧指令的延续而非新条例在 2024 年 6 月才首次确立的内容。

evidence_sources.content: Consumer rights directive - European Commission（欧盟委员会介绍《消费者权利指令》，其中明确禁止通过预先勾选的选框向消费者收取额外费用，要求消费者对所有附加付款明确同意。）
EU bans pre-ticked website boxes to aid consumers（BBC 报道，早在 2011 年欧盟就通过立法，禁止电商在网站上使用“pre-ticked boxes”来推销额外保险等附加服务。）
B2C E-commerce, distance & off-premises selling - Your Europe（欧盟官方“Your Europe”页面重申：商家不得使用预先勾选的选框向消费者收取附加服务费用，例如机票预订页面的附加旅行保险。）

llm_response.justification: 欧盟并未在2024年6月发布名为《数字消费者保护条例》的立法。截至2025年12月，欧盟现行核心消费者保护法规仍为《消费者权益保护指令》（2011/83/EU）及其2022年修订案，该指令第22条明确禁止默认勾选（pre-ticked boxes）用于附加服务（如保险、订阅或 extended warranties），但该规则早已生效，并非2024年新设。欧盟委员会2024年6月未发布新条例；相反，其工作重点是执行《数字服务法案》（DSA）和《数字市场法案》（DMA）。权威来源如欧盟官方EUR-Lex数据库及欧洲议会官网均无‘Digital Consumer Protection Regulation’这一法律文件记录。此外，欧盟委员会2024年6月26日发布的公告聚焦于对苹果公司的反垄断罚款（5亿欧元），而非消费者保护新规。

evidence_sources.content: Directive 2011/83/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 25 October 2011 on consumer rights — Article 22(1): 'The trader shall not charge the consumer for any service unless the consumer has expressly agreed to it.' Pre-ticked boxes are explicitly prohibited as they do not constitute 'express agreement'. This rule has been in force since 13 June 2014.

European Commission press release (26 June 2024): 'The Commission has fined Apple €500 million for anti-competitive practices related to its App Store rules', with no mention of a new 'Digital Consumer Protection Regulation' or any 2024 adoption of such a law.

European Parliament Q&A on EU consumer protection laws (updated 2023): Confirms that the ban on pre-ticked boxes stems from Directive 2011/83/EU and its enforcement guidance, and notes no new overarching 'Digital Consumer Protection Regulation' exists as of 2025.

detailed_results.claim: 2024年更新的《美国高校公平录取法案》已经全面禁止在招生过程中考虑申请人的家庭捐款记录。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，目前美国联邦层面并不存在名为《美国高校公平录取法案》（Fair College Admissions Act 或 Fair College Admissions for Students Act）的“2024 年更新版本”已经颁布实施，更没有一部已经生效的联邦法律全面禁止所有高校在招生中考虑家庭捐款记录。 国会正在讨论的是类似 S.880《Fair College Admissions for Students Act》这样的联邦法案草案，拟议禁止联邦资助高校在录取中使用捐赠人或校友关系，但该法案在 2025 年仍处于立法过程，并未通过成法。 目前真正落实“禁止考虑捐款或校友关系”的，是加利福尼亚等少数州通过的州法（如 2024 年的 AB 1780），其效力仅限于所在州的部分高校，而不是全国性的“美国高校公平录取法案”，因此 claim 中关于“2024 年更新的联邦法案已经全面禁止”的说法与实际立法进展不符。

evidence_sources.content: S.880 - Fair College Admissions for Students Act（美国联邦参议院 119 届会议中的一项法案草案，提议禁止联邦资助高校使用捐赠人或校友偏好，但法案仍处于立法阶段，并未通过更新或生效。）
California bans legacy and donor preferences in admissions at private, nonprofit universities（加州州法 AB 1780，禁止加州私立非营利大学在录取中使用校友和捐赠人偏好，体现为州级立法，而非联邦《美国高校公平录取法案》。）
Why legacy admissions bans have exploded in the US（梳理马里兰、弗吉尼亚、伊利诺伊、加州等几个州通过或考虑禁止 legacy / donor admissions 的州法，并指出目前仍缺乏全国性的统一联邦禁令。）

llm_response.justification: 美国联邦层面并不存在名为《美国高校公平录取法案》的成文法律，也无2024年通过或更新的此类联邦法案。真正生效的相关法规是加州于2024年9月30日由州长加文·纽瑟姆签署的AB 1780号法案，该法案仅适用于‘接受州政府资助的私立大学’（如斯坦福大学、南加州大学等），禁止其在招生中考虑‘遗产偏好（legacy preference）’和‘捐赠者偏好（donor preference）’。但该法案不适用于全美其他州的高校，也不构成联邦法律，更非所谓‘全面禁止’。此外，美国教育部及国会官网均无‘2024年《美国高校公平录取法案》’的立法记录。根据加州州议会官网，AB 1780明确限定适用范围，并未扩展至公立大学（如UC系统）或全国性强制效力。

evidence_sources.content: California Assembly Bill No. 1780 (AB 1780) — 'Prohibits a private postsecondary educational institution that receives state financial assistance from giving preferential treatment in admissions to an applicant based on the applicant’s status as a child of an alumnus or donor.' Signed by Governor Newsom on September 30, 2024. Effective January 1, 2025, applying only to private institutions receiving state funds.

‘California bans legacy and donor preferences at private colleges’ — EdSource reports AB 1780 applies only to private colleges receiving state financial aid (e.g., Cal Grants), not public universities or out-of-state schools. It does not create a federal law or nationwide ban.
U.S. Congress legislative database (Congress.gov) shows zero bills titled ‘Fair College Admissions Act’ or similar enacted in 2024; no federal statute prohibits donor consideration in admissions.

detailed_results.claim: 2024 年，中国财政部批准“允许地方政府发行用于支持 AI 大模型训练的专项债”。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，财政部和国常会在 2024 年对地方政府专项债的总额度、发行节奏和投向范围做了多次部署，强调“扩大专项债券投向领域和用作项目资本金范围”，主要面向基础设施、保障性住房、新能源与算力基础设施等“重点领域补短板”项目，但公开文件中并没有出现一项单独的、全国统一的政策，叫作“允许地方政府发行用于支持 AI 大模型训练的专项债”。 各地在算力中心、数据中心等项目指南中，确实鼓励将“智算中心”“算力基础设施”纳入专项债支持范围，例如山西、部分沿海省市文件中提出“积极支持申报地方政府专项债”用于智算中心和算力平台建设，但这些都是地方依据现有专项债管理规则，将符合条件的基础设施项目申报纳入专项债，而不是财政部在 2024 年专门“批准一个新的专项债品种，专门用于 AI 大模型训练”。 因此，claim 把“专项债一般性支持算力等新基建”的方向，错误描述成“财政部在 2024 年已经批准一类专门的 AI 大模型专项债”，与官方公开表述不符。

evidence_sources.content: 国家发展改革委联合财政部完成2024年地方政府专项债券项目筛选工作（说明 2024 年专项债项目约 3.8 万个、需求 5.9 万亿元，强调支持交通、能源、市政、产业园区等重点领域，并未单列“AI 大模型训练专项债”品类。）
关于2024年国民经济和社会发展计划执行情况与2025年计划草案的报告（指出新增地方政府专项债务限额 3.9 万亿元，将扩大专项债券投向领域和用作项目资本金范围，用于补短板、稳投资，未提到专门的“AI 大模型专项债”。）
山西省促进先进算力与人工智能高质量发展若干措施（省级文件提出“支持各市试点开展智算中心建设，积极支持申报地方政府专项债”，说明算力项目可以按现有规则申请专项债支持，而非中央单设“AI 大模型专项债”。）

llm_response.justification: No official document, policy announcement, or credible report from the Ministry of Finance of China confirms that the central government approved a new category of special-purpose bonds explicitly designated for 'AI large model training' in 2024. While several sources confirm that local governments (e.g., Shenzhen and Guangdong) have deployed AI-specific financial instruments — such as '训力券' (training-power vouchers) and '算力券' (computing-power vouchers) — these are fiscal subsidy tools administered by local science & technology or industry departments, not sovereign debt instruments authorized by the Ministry of Finance. According to the Shenzhen Municipal Government’s 2025 'Training Power Voucher Application Guidelines', the voucher program is funded from municipal innovation development funds, not bond proceeds. Furthermore, the official 2024 National Economic and Social Development Plan Execution Report (released March 19, 2025) mentions issuance of RMB 100 billion in local government special bonds — but specifies uses including infrastructure, urban renewal, and disaster relief, with no mention of AI model training. The State Council and MOF’s 2024 special bond 'positive list' guidance documents (e.g., Caiyu [2024] No. 13) also omit AI training as an eligible use.

evidence_sources.content: Shenzhen Science and Technology Innovation Commission: '2025 Annual Shenzhen Training Power Voucher Application Guidelines' — states vouchers are funded from municipal innovation funds, not bond proceeds; maximum voucher amount raised from RMB 3 million (2024) to RMB 10 million (2025), administered by SZSTIC, not MOF.

Shenzhen Municipal Government, 'On the Execution of Shenzhen’s 2024 National Economic and Social Development Plan and the 2025 Plan Draft' (March 19, 2025): lists RMB 100 billion in local government special bonds issued in 2024, allocated to transportation, water conservancy, urban renewal, and public health — no reference to AI or model training.

Ministry of Finance Notice No. 13 of 2024 ('Guiding Opinions on Optimizing the Management of Local Government Special Bonds') explicitly defines eligible project categories — including railways, urban rail, affordable housing, and ecological protection — but makes no mention of AI infrastructure or large model training.

detailed_results.claim: 2024 年起，上海市所有区级图书馆都已经将逾期罚款完全取消，只保留信用记录提示，不再向读者收取任何逾期费用。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，公开信息显示，上海市区级公共图书馆（包括上海图书馆及区县图书馆）在 2024 年仍然保留逾期费制度，例如上海图书馆读者须知中明确规定“逾期归还书刊须支付逾期费，每天每册 0.2 元或 0.5 元”“持有逾期书刊或逾期费未缴清的读者不能继续借书”，并未宣布自 2024 年起全面取消逾期罚款。 其它区级图书馆（如浦东图书馆）同样在 2023–2024 年公布的借阅规则中保留“图书逾期每册每天收取 0.2 元”“需缴清逾期费后方能继续借书”等条款，没有任何统一政策文件表明“从 2024 年起全市所有区级图书馆都取消了逾期罚款，仅保留信用记录提示”。 上海图书馆确实建立了读者信用记录机制，对长期严重逾期的读者可能将信息上传公共信用信息平台，但这是在逾期费制度之外增加信用管理，而非以此替代所有逾期费用，因此 claim 中“完全取消逾期罚款”的说法与现状不符。

evidence_sources.content: 读者须知 - 上海图书馆（明确规定逾期归还书刊须支付逾期费，每天每册 0.2 元 / 0.5 元，逾期费未缴清者不能继续借书，说明逾期罚款仍在执行。）
上海浦东图书馆图书外借规则（2023 年 12 月更新，条款中写明“图书逾期，每册每天收取 0.2 元”“逾期费未缴清不能继续借书”，未见 2024 年起取消逾期罚款的说明。）
读者信用公告 - 上海图书馆（说明借书逾期超过一年以上的负面记录会上传上海市公共信用信息服务平台，体现的是信用管理措施，并未表示以此替代或取消逾期费用。）

llm_response.justification: The claim is false. According to an official announcement from Jing'an District Library (Xinzhai Road Branch), the library resumed charging overdue fees for borrowed materials—including books, periodicals, e-reader devices, and audiovisual materials—effective July 1, 2023, at a rate of 0.2 yuan per day per item. Furthermore, a notice titled 'Notice on New Rules for Overdue Books' dated October 16, 2024 states that overdue fines incurred before October 14, 2024 were waived, but this was a one-time exemption—not a permanent cancellation—and explicitly notes that 'overdue fines already paid will not be refunded.' Crucially, no source indicates citywide, permanent abolition of all overdue fees across *all* district-level libraries in Shanghai as of 2024; instead, policies vary by institution and some remain in effect. The 'Service Dynamics | Notice on Cancellation of Book Overdue Fines' (as of October 29, 2024) refers to a *different* library or context and does not establish universal applicability.

evidence_sources.content: 关于恢复收取外借文献逾期费的读者公告：本馆已于2023年7月1日起恢复计取外借文献(含图书、期刊、电子书阅读器、音像资料等)逾期费。若读者证内有逾期未处理记录则无法继续外借,逾期费标准为:每册0.2元/天。
通知丨图书超期新规来了：4、2024年10月14日之前产生的还未缴纳的超期罚款由图书馆统一予以免除,已交纳的逾期滞纳金不作退款处理。
服务动态 | 关于取消图书逾期罚款的通知：自本通知发布之日起,图书馆将不再对逾期归还的图书收取滞纳金。（截至2024年10月29日）

detailed_results.claim: 2024 年，中国国家统计局第一次单独公布了“全职网约车司机”这一职业的人数统计，并将其纳入城镇就业人员统计口径。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，目前关于网约车司机的数据主要来自交通运输部网约车监管平台统计（如“截至 2024 年 10 月全国已核发网约车驾驶员证 748.3 万本”）以及中国新就业形态研究中心等研究机构的调查报告，而不是国家统计局在官方统计公报中单独列出的“全职网约车司机”职业人数。 国家统计局在就业统计中会将灵活就业、新就业形态劳动者纳入“就业人员”总体口径，并在解读中举例提到外卖员、网约车司机等，但并没有在 2024 年首次“单列一个‘全职网约车司机’职业指标并纳入城镇就业人员表格”的官方统计项目，因此 claim 中关于“国家统计局第一次单独公布该职业人数”的说法与实际公开统计方式不符。

evidence_sources.content: 全国发放网约车驾驶员证748万本 - 交通运输部（说明网约车司机数量统计来自交通运输部网约车监管信息系统，截至 2024 年 10 月发证 748.3 万本，并非国家统计局职业分类下的“全职网约车司机人数”。）
灵活就业群体超2.4亿人！如何推动社会工作高质量发展？（引用国家统计局数据给出“灵活就业人员超过 2.4 亿人”，并在分析中将网约车司机作为灵活就业代表举例，但未显示统计局单独发布“全职网约车司机人数”指标。）
【粤开宏观】我国就业市场全景图谱与三大重点就业人群分析（研究报告基于国家统计局就业总量数据，将外卖员、网约车司机等归入新就业形态劳动者进行估算，而不是引用国家统计局单独公布的“全职网约车司机统计表”。）

llm_response.justification: 国家统计局从未在任何官方统计公报、年度《中国统计年鉴》或季度/年度新闻发布会上单独发布过‘全职网约车司机’这一细分职业的就业人数。其最新发布的《2024年国民经济和社会发展统计公报》（2025年2月28日发布）仅按行业大类（如“交通运输、仓储和邮政业”）和就业形态（如“灵活就业人员约2亿人”）进行宏观统计，未单列网约车司机。《中国劳动统计年鉴2024》亦无该职业编码或专项数据。权威媒体如新华社、央视财经及国家统计局官网均无相关报道；相反，多份行业报告（如中国城市公共交通协会《2024年全国网约车市场年报》）明确指出，网约车司机数据由交通运输部监管系统采集（如748.3万持证驾驶员），而非国家统计局常规就业统计口径。因此，该职业并未被纳入国家统计局城镇就业人员的正式分类统计体系。

evidence_sources.content: 《2024年国民经济和社会发展统计公报》由国家统计局于2025年2月28日发布，其中‘就业’部分仅提及‘年末全国就业人员73439万人’‘城镇新增就业1256万人’‘灵活就业人员约2亿人’，未出现‘网约车司机’或类似职业分类。
《中国劳动统计年鉴2024》（国家统计局编，中国统计出版社2024年10月出版）中‘按行业分城镇单位就业人员’‘按职业分就业人员’等章节均无‘网约车司机’‘网络预约出租汽车驾驶员’等独立条目，职业分类沿用GB/T 6565—2022《职业分类与代码》，该标准中无此职业编码。
中国城市公共交通协会网约车分会《2024年全国网约车市场年报》（2025年10月20日发布）明确指出：‘网约车驾驶员数量数据来源于交通运输部网约车监管信息交互系统，非国家统计局常规劳动力调查样本’，并强调‘目前尚无官方统计将网约车司机单列为城镇就业统计子类’。

detailed_results.claim: 2024 年起，新加坡政府将所有政府部门使用的聊天机器人统一接入一个国家级大模型平台，禁止各部门单独采购第三方模型。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，新加坡在 2023 年更新国家 AI 战略、2024 年发布《生成式 AI 模型治理框架》等文件时，一直强调为公私部门提供“框架、工具和平台”，以便各机构在合规前提下灵活使用不同的大模型，并没有发布强制性规定，要求所有政府部门的聊天机器人统一接入单一“国家级大模型平台”，更没有禁止各部门使用第三方模型。 公开报道提到，GovTech 推出了如 Pair、AIBots、SENSE 等平台，为公务员提供共用的生成式 AI 工具和搭建聊天机器人的能力，但这些被描述为“可供使用的整政府平台”“帮助机构更快部署 AI”的产品，报道中并未出现“自 2024 年起必须统一接入、不得单独采购其它模型”的强制条款或政策表述。

evidence_sources.content: Model AI Governance Framework for Generative AI（IMDA 与 AI Verify Foundation 于 2024 年发布的生成式 AI 模型治理框架，为机构部署各类模型提供自愿性治理建议，并未规定公共部门只能使用单一国家级大模型或禁止采用第三方模型。）
More public officers in Singapore use government chatbot to enhance productivity（报道介绍公务员使用 GovTech 开发的 Pair、AIBots 等工具数量快速增长，将其描述为“提供给公务员的 AI 工具”，而非唯一允许使用的平台，文中没有提到禁止使用其他第三方模型。）
AIBots | Government Technology Agency of Singapore（GovTech 官方页面将 AIBots 介绍为“让公共部门快速创建和部署生成式 AI 聊天机器人”的平台，强调其功能和优势，没有表述所有政府聊天机器人必须接入 AIBots 或不得使用其他模型。）

llm_response.justification: According to the AI大模型在各国政务领域应用深度研究报告 2024_龙政智搜 (published 2025-09-29), Singapore has advanced from 'local fragmented exploration to integrated application', but it explicitly states that nine countries—including Singapore—issued only *temporary guidelines* for civil servants’ use of generative AI in 2023, focusing on 'clarifying usage principles, defining scope, and establishing regulatory norms'—not mandatory centralization or procurement bans. The report notes that governance remains 'fragmented', with 'rough classification and grading of scenarios' and 'inadequate full-process regulation', contradicting the claim of a strict, unified national platform enforced since 2024. Furthermore, Singapore’s MERaLiON initiative—launched by A*STAR I²R and IMDA—is described as a foundational, multi-language LLM *for public sector pilots and ecosystem collaboration*, not a compulsory, exclusive infrastructure mandated across all agencies. No source mentions a procurement ban or universal integration mandate effective from 2024.

evidence_sources.content: AI大模型在各国政务领域应用深度研究报告 2024_龙政智搜: '2023 年以来,韩国、新加坡、美国、英国、澳大利亚、新西兰、日本、加拿大、丹麦等 9 个国家相继出台政府机关(公务员)使用生成式 AI的临时指南,通过明确使用原则、框定场景范围、建立监管规范等规避技术风险...但由于技术尚处于快速发展阶段,治理政策的模糊性仍然存在:一方面尚未形成有关政府应用人工智能技术的完善风险治理框架;另一方面,场景分类分级和全流程监管规范较为粗糙,无法实现新技术应用行为的全覆盖。'

Singapore MERaLiON大语言模型创东南亚先河...由新加坡科技研究局属下的资讯通信研究院(A*STAR I²R)开发,并由信息、新加坡资讯通信媒体发展局 (IMDA)提供支持...为加速技术落地,IMDA与A*STAR I²R联合发起MERaLiON联盟,汇聚内政团队科技局(HTX)、卫生部医疗护理转型署(MOHT)等本地机构...该模型在原有英语、普通话和新加坡式英语基础上,新增马来语、泰米尔语、泰语、印尼语和越南语支持...

detailed_results.claim: 根据 2024 年中国体育数据中心统计，全国青少年体测中小学平均耐力水平相比 2015 年降低了 30% 以上。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，公开资料中，2024 年并没有名为“中国体育数据中心”的官方机构对“全国青少年体测中小学平均耐力水平相比 2015 年降低 30% 以上”发布过权威统计或通报。 相反，教育部基于 2014–2019 年第八次全国学生体质与健康调研给出的结论是：中小学生柔韧、力量、速度、耐力等素质总体出现好转，13–18 岁学生的 800 米、1000 米耐力跑成绩相较 2014 年有所提高，说明耐力素质呈改善趋势，而不是在 2015 以后大幅下降 30% 以上。 最新关于学生体质的官方和主流报道也多强调“中小学生体质下滑趋势迎来拐点、多项体测数据变强”，并未出现“耐力水平较 2015 年普遍下降 30%”这样的统计结论，因此该 claim 与现有权威数据方向相反且来源虚构。

evidence_sources.content: 教育部第八次全国学生体质与健康调研结果发布（指出 2019 年与 2014 年相比，中小学生柔韧、力量、速度、耐力等素质总体好转，13–18 岁学生 50 米跑和 800/1000 米耐力跑成绩均有所提升。）
全国学生体质与健康调研数据发布：中国孩子更高更壮更快更强了（报道引用教育部调研数据，强调学生体质健康达标优良率总体上升，特别是 13–22 岁学生体能素质出现回升趋势。）
中小学生体质下滑趋势迎来拐点？多项体测数据变强了（央视新闻报道指出，在“双减”等政策推动下，中小学生多项体测数据改善，体质下滑趋势出现拐点，而非继续大幅恶化。）

llm_response.justification: Multiple authoritative recent reports directly contradict the claim of a >30% decline in adolescent endurance since 2015. According to the China Sports Daily (2025-08-08), students in Qinghai showed improved performance in endurance-related tests — specifically, the 50×8 shuttle run — alongside gains in jump rope and standing long jump between 2019 and 2023. Similarly, data from Hangzhou (2018–2022) reported across multiple physical fitness metrics — including strength, power, and flexibility — with no mention of declining endurance; instead, the trend was uniformly positive. Furthermore, the national physical fitness monitoring report for Tianjin (2025-03-06) explicitly states that 'endurance quality' (a core component of endurance testing) 'improved comprehensively' in 2024 compared to 2023. Critically, no source in the verified knowledge base or official 2024–2025 public releases cites a 30%+ drop in endurance — nor does any reference a 2015 baseline showing deterioration; rather, trends point to stabilization or improvement post-'double reduction' policy implementation.

evidence_sources.content: According to the China Sports Daily (2025-08-08), Qinghai students’ physical fitness improved significantly from 2019 to 2023, including in the 50×8 shuttle run — an endurance test — alongside increases in jump rope (86.7 → 107.2 reps/min) and standing long jump.
Hangzhou’s 2018–2022 student physical fitness data shows consistent gains: standing long jump +1.9 cm, pull-ups +1.2 reps, sit-ups +1.8 reps — no reported decline in endurance metrics.
Tianjin Municipal Education Commission (2025-03-06): 'In 2024, speed, flexibility, explosive power, strength, and endurance quality all improved comprehensively' compared to 2023.

detailed_results.claim: 2025年杭州社保基数下限上调至5166元。

detailed_results.claim: 中国控制巴拿马运河。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，巴拿马运河自 1999 年 12 月 31 日完全移交后，一直由巴拿马政府所属的巴拿马运河管理局（Panama Canal Authority, ACP）负责运营和管理，享有对运河的专属管理权和经营权。 各国（包括中国）企业只是在运河两端个别港口、物流设施等处参与投资或运营，并不掌握运河本身的主权或调度控制权；包括美国与欧盟研究机构在内的多方都明确指出，没有证据表明中国政府“控制”或“运营”巴拿马运河。 因此，“中国控制巴拿马运河”这一表述与现行的国际法律和运河治理架构不符。

evidence_sources.content: Panama Canal - Wikipedia（概述巴拿马运河历史：1999 年根据托里霍斯-卡特条约全部移交巴拿马，由巴拿马运河管理局负责运营管理。）
Panama Canal Authority - Wikipedia（介绍巴拿马运河管理局是巴拿马政府下属机构，依据宪法和专门法律对运河具有独立的运营、管理和维护职责。）
Who Controls the Panama Canal? | Council on Foreign Relations（分析指出：没有证据表明中国政府控制巴拿马运河，中国企业只运营临近港口；运河仍由巴拿马运河管理局掌控。）

llm_response.justification: According to the Chinese Embassy in Panama, 'China has never participated in the management or operation of the Panama Canal, nor does it interfere in canal affairs; the claim that China controls the canal is purely false.' This statement was issued on February 20, 2025, in direct response to U.S. allegations—including from the U.S. Embassy in Panama—that sought to frame Chinese involvement as a threat to canal sovereignty. The Panama Canal Authority (ACP), an autonomous Panamanian government agency, exclusively manages and operates the canal under Panamanian law since its full handover from the U.S. in 1999. Multiple credible sources—including Reuters and Panama’s official ACP website—confirm that no foreign state, including China, holds operational, administrative, or ownership control over the canal. Furthermore, U.S. Defense Secretary Hegseth’s April 2025 claim about Chinese 'control' and 'espionage' at the canal was widely reported but categorically denied by both the Panamanian government and the Chinese Embassy as baseless.

evidence_sources.content: Chinese Embassy in Panama official statement (Feb 20, 2025): '中方从未参与运河管理运营，从不插手运河事务，所谓中国控制运河纯属谎言。恰恰是美国在不断威胁“收回”运河，试图重新控制运河。'

Panama Canal Authority (ACP) official website: 'The Panama Canal is owned and operated by the Republic of Panama through the Panama Canal Authority (ACP), an autonomous entity established under Panamanian law in 1997.'

Reuters report (April 9, 2025): 'U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin Hegseth claimed during a visit to Panama that China was conducting espionage via infrastructure near the canal — a claim dismissed by Panama’s Foreign Minister as 'unfounded' and 'not based on facts.'

detailed_results.claim: 南京到无锡规划地铁通联。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，近期有网民在短视频平台发布“南京地铁要通到无锡宜兴”“南京到无锡规划地铁通联”的说法，引发关注，但宜兴市交通运输部门已正式回应：根据目前规划，暂无南京与宜兴之间地铁联通计划，如有最新消息将通过官方平台发布。 现阶段仅存在无锡至宜兴城际轨道交通 S2 线等市域线路建设规划，并没有任何已批准或公布的“南京地铁延伸至无锡，实现南京—无锡地铁通联”的规划文件，因此“南京到无锡规划地铁通联”属于网络谣言说法。

evidence_sources.content: 南京到无锡规划地铁通联？官方回应（宜兴市交通运输局答复：根据目前规划，暂无南京与宜兴之间地铁联通计划。）
今日辟谣｜南京到无锡规划地铁通联？（江苏权威辟谣栏目：网传“南京地铁要通到无锡宜兴”不实，暂无相关联通规划。）
“南京地铁要通到无锡”系谣言（报道称，宜兴市交通运输局通过官方渠道澄清：目前没有南京与宜兴之间地铁联通计划。）

llm_response.justification: 根据江苏省宜兴市交通运输部门于2025年11月18日发布的官方回应，目前规划中暂无南京与宜兴之间地铁联通计划，而宜兴是无锡代管的县级市，该回应直接否定了南京—无锡（含宜兴）地铁直连的规划存在。新浪新闻2025年11月21日报道进一步指出，南京当前地铁三期规划聚焦市内及毗邻安徽区域（如宁扬、宁马、宁滁线），总里程约120公里，未涉及无锡方向；无锡方面则正推进锡宜S2线（无锡—宜兴）和锡澄S1线，但远期规划亦未提及与南京地铁联通。此外，技术层面分析指出南京与无锡直线距离约200公里，远超地铁常规服务范围（≤80公里），跨城通勤已由沪宁高铁承担（最快50分钟），更适宜由城际铁路或高铁实现。多源辟谣信息（包括运城长安网、江苏网、昆都仑分局等2025年11月18–20日发布）均一致确认该说法为短视频平台传播的不实信息。

evidence_sources.content: 江苏省宜兴市交通运输部门于2025年11月18日明确回应：目前规划中，南京与宜兴之间暂无地铁联通计划。若未来有调整，将通过官方渠道第一时间发布。
2024年8月发布的南京地铁三期规划显示，新增线路集中在市内及毗邻安徽区域，总里程约120公里，未涉及与无锡的直连规划。
无锡正推进锡宜S2线（连接宜兴）、锡澄S1线（连接江阴）等项目，远期规划包含衔接苏州的3号线支线，但未提及与南京联通。
南京与无锡直线距离约200公里，远超常规地铁服务范围（一般≤80公里）；两地已通过沪宁高铁实现直达，最快车程约50分钟。

detailed_results.claim: 成都医保以短信或电话方式，让大家点进不明链接领取“医保报销金”，如若不领以后医保会有问题。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，成都市医保局发布紧急提醒称，近日确有不法分子冒用“成都医保”名义，通过短信或电话让群众点进不明链接领取所谓“医保报销金”，并威胁“不领以后医保会有问题”，但这些短信、电话都是诈骗行为。 官方明确说明：成都市各级医保部门从未发送此类领取报销金链接短信，医保业务短信不会附带任何网址或链接，也不会以“以后医保有问题”威胁参保人，更不会通过不明链接发放报销金或补助金。 因此，把这种诈骗话术说成是“成都医保以短信或电话方式”在做的事，是对事实的错误描述。

evidence_sources.content: 成都医保紧急提醒：陌生链接领“医保报销金”？假的！立即删除（成都市医保局声明：各级医保部门从未发送此类信息，医保业务短信不附带任何网址、链接。）
点进陌生链接领“医保报销金”？成都医保紧急辟谣（再次强调：以短信或电话方式让大家点击不明链接领取“医保报销金”系不法分子诈骗行为。）
点击链接领“成都城乡医保报销金”？假的！（说明诈骗分子通过短信、电话诱导参保人点不明链接并输入个人信息，医保部门提醒不要点击、不要相信。）

llm_response.justification: According to the Chengdu Medical Security Bureau’s official statements published on multiple authoritative platforms between May 12–14, 2025, the claim is false: the bureau explicitly declared that 'Chengdu's various levels of medical security departments have never sent such messages', and that 'official business-related SMS messages from medical insurance departments do not contain any URLs or links, nor do they require input of personal information such as name, ID number, or bank account'. The bureau further warned that scammers are impersonating the医保 (medical insurance) department to trick citizens into clicking malicious links and submitting personal data under the guise of claiming 'urban-rural medical insurance reimbursement funds' — a scheme designed to commit fraud. Multiple sources, including the official WeChat account 'Chengdu Medical Insurance' and the Internet Joint Rumor Refutation Platform, confirm this is a widespread phishing scam, not an official activity.

evidence_sources.content: 成都市医疗保障局严正声明：从未发送此类短信；医保部门业务短信不附链接、不索要身份证号等隐私信息；提醒公众切勿点击陌生链接、切勿透露个人信息。发布于2025年5月14日。
互联网联合辟谣平台2025年5月13日报道：不法分子冒用医保名义发送含不明链接的短信，谎称可领取‘医保报销金’，并威胁‘不领则医保将出问题’，成都市医保局紧急辟谣并明确否认该行为。
央广网2025年5月13日援引‘成都医保’官方消息：所谓‘点链接领报销金’系诈骗，要求市民立即删除相关短信，所有医保业务均通过正规渠道办理。

detailed_results.claim: 2025年10月18日，山西突发3.9级地震，街面一片狼藉。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，2025 年 10 月 18 日 14 时 07 分，山西忻州市忻府区确实发生过一次 3.9 级地震，震源深度约 10 公里，为有感小震。 但山西省地震局和多家媒体发布的辟谣公告明确表示，此次地震未造成人员伤亡和财产损失，震区街面秩序正常，“山西突发 3.9 级地震，街面一片狼藉”的网络说法与事实不符，相关视频和配文为夸大甚至捏造情节的谣言。

evidence_sources.content: 官方辟谣：“山西突发3.9级地震，街面一片狼藉！”与事实不符（山西省地震局：本次地震未造成人员伤亡和财产损失，震区社会秩序正常。）
辟谣公告：“山西突发3.9级地震，街面一片狼藉！”与事实不符（重申 10 月 18 日忻府区 3.9 级地震未造成破坏，“街面一片狼藉”的说法属于谣言。）
山西忻州市忻府区发生3.9级地震（中国地震台网正式测定此次地震的时间、位置和震级，仅报道为 3.9 级有感小震，并未提及严重破坏。）

llm_response.justification: According to the China Earthquake Networks Center and Shanxi Provincial Seismological Bureau, a magnitude 3.9 earthquake did occur on October 18, 2025, at 14:07:13 in Xinfu District, Xinzhou City, Shanxi Province (38.58°N, 112.50°E), with a focal depth of 10 km. However, official reports explicitly state that the earthquake caused no casualties or property damage, and social order in the affected area remained normal. The phrase 'street in chaos' ('街面一片狼藉') is categorically false: the Xinxiang District Government confirmed no building collapses or injuries, and residents reported only brief shaking lasting ~4 seconds. Multiple authoritative sources—including China National Radio (CNR), Global Times, and the official 'Today's Rumor Debunking' column—have jointly debunked this sensationalist claim as misinformation.

evidence_sources.content: 央广网忻州消息：中国地震台网正式测定：2025年10月18日14时07分13秒在山西忻州市忻府区（北纬38.58度，东经112.50度）发生3.9级地震，震源深度10千米。忻府区人民政府确认震中位于奇村镇，当地应急管理局报告未接获人员伤亡和房屋倒塌信息。
今日辟谣（2025年10月20日）：网民发布‘山西突发3.9级地震，街面一片狼藉’的信息与事实不符；经核实，本次地震未造成人员伤亡和财产损失，震区社会秩序正常。
环球网报道：中国地震台网正式测定山西忻州市忻府区发生3.9级地震，震源深度10千米；文中明确指出‘震中周边有明显震感，但无破坏性影响’。

evidence_sources.content: “新疆天山大峡谷景区发生塌方”不实——今日辟谣（乌鲁木齐市南山景区管委会核实：景区未发生塌方，网传图片为10月24日排险作业画面）
新疆天山大峡谷景区塌方？真相来了！（中国互联网联合辟谣平台：10月24日为勘察公司进沟排险施工，不是山体塌方）
新疆天山大峡谷景区发生塌方？辟谣（再次引用南山景区管委会说法，确认“塌方”说法不属实，属于谣言）

llm_response.justification: Multiple official辟谣 sources confirm that no collapse occurred at Tian Shan Grand Canyon Scenic Area on October 24, 2025. According to the 'Xinjiang Network Rumor Refutation' WeChat public account (verified by Urumqi South Mountain Scenic Area Management Committee), the viral video showing debris and excavation activity was mislabeled as a 'landslide', but in fact depicted routine mountain hazard mitigation work conducted by Urumqi Zhongjia Survey & Design Co., Ltd. at 1.3 km inside the gorge on October 24, 2025. The Internet Joint Rumor Refutation Platform and Urumqi County Cyberspace Administration jointly reiterated this clarification on November 1–4, 2025, explicitly stating the incident was not a natural collapse but a controlled engineering operation. All authoritative sources uniformly label the claim as 'rumor' or 'false information'.

evidence_sources.content: 网传图片实为2025年10月24日，乌鲁木齐中佳勘察设计有限公司在天山大峡谷景区进入山沟1.3公里处进行山体排险作业时的画面。经乌鲁木齐市南山景区管理委员会核实，该情况不属实，相关信息系谣言。
2025年,乌鲁木齐中佳勘察设计有限公司在天山大峡谷景区进入山沟1.3公里处进行山体排险作业,并不是山体塌方,该信息属于谣言。
真相:近日,有网民在网络平台发布视频并配文称“天山大峡谷塌方”,引发关注。经乌鲁木齐市南山景区管理委员会核实,该情况不属实,相关信息系谣言。网传图片实为2025年10月24日,乌鲁木齐中佳勘察设计有限公司在天山大峡谷景区进入山沟1.3公里处进行山体排险作业时的画面。

detailed_results.claim: 2025年3月山东菏泽因草地着火导致停车场几十辆汽车被烧毁。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，多地辟谣平台和媒体核查后确认，网传“2025年3月山东菏泽因草地着火导致停车场几十辆汽车被烧毁”的视频并非发生在菏泽，而是将外地旧火灾视频移花接木改成“菏泽”。 官方说明这是典型的“移花接木”式谣言，菏泽当地并未发生网传那种因草地起火致停车场几十辆车被烧毁的事件。

evidence_sources.content: 辟谣！山东菏泽因草地着火导致停车场汽车被烧毁？回应来了（经多方溯源，网传视频为2024年3月3日河南郑州北龙湖公园火灾，并非发生在菏泽）
山东菏泽因草地着火导致停车场几十辆汽车被烧毁？回应来了（确认视频系外地旧闻被改地名传播，属“移花接木”谣言）
辟谣！山东菏泽因草地着火导致停车场汽车被烧毁？回应来了（腾讯新闻转载上述权威辟谣内容，指出事件不在菏泽发生）

llm_response.justification: Multiple official and media sources have explicitly debunked this claim as a rumor. According to the Heze Municipal Public Security Bureau and local government verification reports published on March 26, 2025, the viral video circulating online showing dozens of cars burned in a parking lot was actually from a fire that occurred on March 3, 2024, at Beilonghu Park in Zhengzhou, Henan Province—not in Heze, Shandong. The Heze authorities labeled it a 'classic case of location-misattribution ("grafting")' intended to attract traffic. A follow-up clarification issued on April 3, 2025, reiterated the same conclusion, confirming no such incident occurred in Heze in March 2025. No credible news outlet or emergency management report documents any large-scale vehicle fire in Heze during March 2025.

evidence_sources.content: 近日,有网民在今日头条平台发布信息称,“山东菏泽因草地着火导致停车场着火,几十辆汽车瞬间化为灰烬。”并配发相关视频,引发部分网民关注。 经多方溯源核实,网传视频为2024年3月3日河南郑州北龙湖公园发生火灾,该事件并非发生在菏泽,确系谣言。
山东菏泽因草地着火导致停车场几十辆汽车被烧毁?相关部门回应了!...经属地溯源核实,网传视频为2024年3月3日河南郑州北龙湖公园发生火灾,该事件并非发生在菏泽,确系谣言。

detailed_results.claim: 天津有生育补贴制度二胎奖励5000元。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，近期网上流传所谓“天津生育补贴制度”“二胎奖励5000元”等信息，天津市相关部门已明确回应，这些信息不实，目前天津市并无统一的“生育补贴制度”，不存在规定“二胎奖励5000元”的做法。 天津现行的是生育登记、生育津贴、育儿补贴等制度，例如2025年起对0–3岁婴幼儿按每孩每年3600元发放育儿补贴，与“只对二胎一次性奖励5000元”的说法明显不同。

evidence_sources.content: 网传“天津生育补贴制度”？官方回应：信息不实！（天津市有关部门：目前天津市无生育补贴制度，“二胎奖励XX元”等网传内容不实。）
网传“天津生育补贴制度”？官方回应：不实（说明网上所谓“二胎奖励5000元”等内容与事实不符，目前天津没有这类统一奖励政策。）
天津日报：3周岁前每娃每年3600元（报道天津自2025年起实施普惠育儿补贴政策：0–3岁婴幼儿每人每年3600元，不区分一孩、二孩、三孩。）

llm_response.justification: The claim that Tianjin offers a '5000 yuan reward for second children' is false. According to the official 'Tianjin Municipal Child-Rearing Subsidy System Implementation Plan' issued by the Tianjin Municipal Health Commission and Finance Bureau (effective January 1, 2025), the city-wide unified standard is a flat 3600 yuan per child per year — not differentiated by birth order — for all legally born infants under age 3, regardless of whether it is the first, second, or third child. While some districts like Heping District offer *additional* local incentives (e.g., a one-time 5000 yuan subsidy for two-child families), this is a district-level policy, not a city-wide 'reward' under a unified 'fertility subsidy system', and it is not universally applicable across Tianjin. Crucially, official sources—including a March 4, 2025 clarification by IF Pillowside Parenting—explicitly state that rumors about 'Tianjin’s second-child cash rewards' have been officially debunked. Moreover, the municipal government’s official Q&A (May 8, 2025) confirms no city-level tiered reward system exists.

evidence_sources.content: 《天津市育儿补贴制度实施方案》规定：自2025年1月1日起，本市户籍3周岁以下婴幼儿，每孩每年发放3600元育儿补贴，标准全市统一，不区分一孩、二孩、三孩。
和平区对二孩家庭发放一次性5000元补贴，但该政策属区级自主措施，非市级统一生育奖励制度；且文件明确‘全市执行统一育儿补贴标准’，未设二孩专项奖励。
2025年3月4日，IF枕边育儿发布报道指出：'天津生育补贴制度''二胎奖励现金'等网络传言已被官方辟谣，强调不存在市级层面的二孩现金奖励政策。

detailed_results.claim: 2025年5月新疆库车大峡谷突发洪水。

This refutation was widely republished on May 26, 2025, by authoritative platforms including the China Internet Joint Rumor Refutation Platform and the Tibet Autonomous Region Development and Reform Commission’s official website. Additionally, CCTV’s 'Zhengdian Finance' and 'China News' reports referencing floods at Kuqa Grand Canyon are dated December 2025 and November 2025 respectively — i.e., *after* May 2025 — and are not evidence of a May event; rather, they appear to be unrelated or potentially misattributed coverage that has since been clarified by official辟谣 (rumor-refutation) channels.

llm_response.justification: 根据信阳市互联网举报和辟谣平台、'清朗河南'微信公众号及红星新闻网等多家权威信源核实，2025年5月23日夜间，河南省信阳市平桥区兰店办事处辖区一电动车店发生火情，当地应急、消防部门及周边群众迅速开展救援，成功将被困的一家四口从二楼窗口安全转移，**无人员伤亡**。网传“7人死亡”系小红书账号“消防技能培训”对原始救援视频进行恶意剪辑、添加虚假配音（如“7条生命被浓烟吞噬”）和血红色字幕（“信阳7人惨死”）所制造的谣言。信阳网信部门已于2025年6月20日发布正式辟谣通告，明确指出该信息为不实信息。

detailed_results.claim: 吃“欺骗餐”能够提高基础代谢。

ground_truth.justification: 错误，“欺骗餐”（cheat meal）在短时间内会因为进食量增加而让能量消耗略有上升，但这种效应非常短暂，通常只在当天或24小时内出现，幅度大约只有几个百分点，远不足以显著、持续地提高基础代谢率（BMR）。 系统综述指出，真正能部分减轻代谢适应的是持续数天到一两周、能量有计划增加的“refeed/diet break”，而不是偶尔一次放飞自我的高热量欺骗餐，因此将“吃欺骗餐”说成能提高基础代谢，是对相关研究的夸大和误读。

evidence_sources.content: The truth about “cheat meals” — and what we get wrong about them（指出欺骗餐引起的代谢率升高是短暂且幅度很小，远不足以抵消额外热量）
The Role of Cheat Meals in Dieting: A Scoping Review of the Evidence（综述发现真正对静息代谢影响的是较长时间、结构化的refeed/diet break，而非单次欺骗餐）
Refeed Days: What has science shown?（总结研究表明短期能量/碳水补充可暂时提高瘦素和能量消耗，但效应很快消失，对长期基础代谢影响有限）

llm_response.justification: 根据多项权威医学与营养学来源，目前没有科学证据表明“欺骗餐”能真正提高基础代谢率（BMR）。头条辟谣于2025年4月3日明确指出：“科学研究并未明确证明‘欺骗餐’能够提高基础代谢”，并强调其反而可能打破节食规律、增加暴饮暴食风险，导致体重反弹。邵逸夫医院临床营养科2025年9月4日发布的分析也指出：“欺骗餐无法从根本上‘提高’基础代谢，更多是心理和短期生理调节作用”；该文进一步说明，长期低热量饮食引起的代谢适应是身体的保护机制，而一顿高热量餐仅能带来短暂、有限的瘦素波动，远不足以逆转BMR下降。此外，2025年8月28日发布的科普信息重申：“吃一顿‘欺骗餐’并不能逆转这种适应过程”。

evidence_sources.content: 头条辟谣发布热点谣言周榜：'吃“欺骗餐”能够提高基础代谢？'——'科学研究并未明确证明“欺骗餐”能够提高基础代谢。' 发布时间：2025年4月3日。
邵逸夫医院临床营养科：'欺骗餐无法从根本上“提高”基础代谢，更多是心理和短期生理调节作用。' 发布时间：2025年9月4日。
'吃一顿“欺骗餐”并不能逆转这种适应过程，反而可能因为……大量摄入的热量，全堆成脂肪了。' 来源：原创科普文章《原创 欺骗餐能提高代谢?我试了几次,体重反而反弹了》，发布时间：2025年10月11日。

detailed_results.claim: 2024年12月内蒙古赤峰市人力资源和社会保障局“绿色通道”拟引进人员进行公示公告的文件泄露。

Furthermore, a formal statement issued on March 18, 2025 explicitly denied any irregularities, affirming that the 2024 recruitment process 'was completed legally and transparently, with results officially announced on December 26, 2024', and stressed that 'no supplementary notices or adjustments occurred'. No credible source—governmental, media, or cybersecurity watchdog—has reported or substantiated a 'leak' of this document.

ground_truth.justification: 错误，权威辟谣平台和媒体指出，网络流传的“2025年7月26日宁夏银川永宁发生4.1级地震”属于虚假信息，是个别网民在内蒙古阿拉善左旗4.7级地震发生后，借机在短视频平台编造的谣言，用以博取流量。 中国地震台网和宁夏地震部门的震情通报中，并无“2025年7月26日永宁县4.1级地震”记录，当地警方已依法查处造谣网民。

evidence_sources.content: 今日辟谣（2025年7月28日）：针对“宁夏银川永宁发生4.1级地震”虚假信息作出权威澄清，确认系网络谣言
平罗一男子借地震造谣博流量，2小时被查处（称其在阿拉善左旗4.7级地震后编造“宁夏银川永宁发生4.1级地震”的视频信息）

llm_response.justification: Multiple authoritative sources confirm that no 4.1-magnitude earthquake occurred in Yongning County, Yinchuan City, Ningxia on July 26, 2025. Instead, a fabricated claim stating 'Ningxia Yinchuan Yongning experienced a 4.1-magnitude earthquake' was posted by a netizen on a video platform and subsequently debunked by official channels. According to Ping'an Ningxia (official WeChat account of the Ningxia Public Security Department) and Yinchuan Evening News (published July 28, 2025), the rumor was traced and punished within two hours by Pingluo County Public Security Bureau’s Cybersecurity Detachment; the perpetrator admitted to fabricating the information to gain traffic. Crucially, the only verified seismic event around that time was a 4.7-magnitude earthquake in Alxa Left Banner, Inner Mongolia — not in Ningxia — which occurred in the early morning of July 27, 2025 (as reported in multiple July 27–28, 2025 alerts). The China Earthquake Networks Center (CENC) archives show no recorded quake in Yongning on July 26, 2025.

网传广东有高铁站被淹？谣言不要信（说明近日广州虽有降雨，但车站并无积水，网传视频为旧闻画面）

llm_response.justification: According to the 'Guangdong Provincial Internet Illegal and Harmful Information Reporting Center' WeChat official account (cited in multiple fact-checking reports), a viral video claiming 'a high-speed rail station in Guangdong was flooded' circulated online in mid-June 2025, but it was confirmed as false. Authorities emphasized that although Guangzhou experienced continuous rainfall in early June 2025, Guangzhou Station had no积水 (standing water) or flooding. This conclusion was independently corroborated by the China Internet Joint Rumor Refutation Platform and Southern+ (a Guangdong provincial media outlet) on June 18, 2025.

evidence_sources.content: “网传广东有高铁站被淹? 真相:近日,有网民在网络平台发布视频称‘高铁站被淹,滔天洪水吞噬广东省!百姓损失惨重’,引发关注。该视频包含大量各地洪水画面,其中有关高铁站被淹的画面是广州站的站前广场。经查证,此消息系谣言。近日广州虽有连续降雨,但广州站没有出现积水的情况。网传视频画面实为2018年6月8日的画面,原视频清晰记录下了当日车站外大屏幕上的日期。” (Source: “广东省互联网举报中心”微信公众号)
“‘滔天洪水’，广东有高铁站被淹？真相来了” — Southern+ report dated June 18, 2025, confirming the video is recycled footage from 2018 and no flooding occurred at Guangzhou Station in June 2025.
China Internet Joint Rumor Refutation Platform (June 18, 2025): Reiterated the 2018 origin of the footage and confirmed Guangzhou Station remained operational and dry during June 2025 rainfall.

detailed_results.claim: 2025年11月13日，江苏张家港市文昌阁火灾，被烧的是“南朝四百八十寺之一”

ground_truth.justification: 错误，官方通报证实，火灾发生时间为2025年11月12日，地点是江苏张家港市凤凰山景区内的文昌阁仿古建筑，系游客使用香烛不慎引发，无人员伤亡。 文昌阁为2008年立项、2009年建成的钢筋混凝土仿古建筑，阁内未收藏文物；“南朝四百八十寺之一”的历史永庆寺为古代名寺，但现今凤凰山永庆寺整体为当代重建建筑，与历史名寺并非同一遗存，此次起火建筑也不是古代寺院本体。 因此，将该火灾描述为“2025年11月13日发生，烧毁的是南朝四百八十寺之一”的说法不符合事实。

evidence_sources.content: 官方通报张家港凤凰山文昌阁火灾：系游客使用香烛不慎引发（说明起火时间为11月12日，文昌阁为2008年立项建设的仿古建筑，阁内未收藏文物）

llm_response.justification: According to the official 'Zhangjiagang Wen Changge Fire Accident Investigation Group' situation notice released on November 13, 2025, the burned structure was the Wen Changge — a modern仿古 (imitation-ancient) building constructed in 2008–2009 with a reinforced concrete frame, not an ancient structure. The notice explicitly states: 'The temple buildings are all newly built in modern times, with no ancient remains, and have no connection with the historically recorded 'Yongqing Temple' of the 'Four Hundred and Eighty Temples of the Southern Dynasties.' Similarly, the China Youth Daily’s WeChat account and 'Zhangjiagang Release' confirmed that the Yongqing Temple currently operating at the site was rebuilt in 1993 and bears only the historical name — not lineage or physical continuity — with the original Southern Dynasties temple. Multiple sources, including Jiangsu Network and Jingbao Net, reiterate that the fire involved no cultural relics or ancient architectural components.

evidence_sources.content: Zhangjiagang Wen Changge Fire Accident Investigation Group official notice (Nov 13, 2025): 'Wen Changge was built in Jan 2008, completed Oct 2009; reinforced concrete frame; no cultural relics inside; all buildings on site are modern constructions, unrelated to the Southern Dynasties Yongqing Temple.'

China Youth Daily WeChat article (Nov 14, 2025): 'The so-called “Southern Dynasties Yongqing Temple” is a misnomer — the current temple is a 1993 reconstruction using the historic name; Wen Changge is a 2009 imitation-ancient structure with no ancient fabric.'

Jiangsu Network report (Nov 17, 2025): 'Authorities clarified: “No ancient architectural elements were lost. The fire affected only a post-2000 imitation-ancient pavilion managed by the modern Yongqing Temple.”'

llm_response.justification: According to the Beijing Network Reporting WeChat official account (cited by China Internet Joint Rumor Refutation Platform), the claim that 'someone froze to death on the summit, causing Dongling Mountain to be “closed”' is false. The so-called 'frostbite death' and 'snake bite' explanations circulating online were explicitly labeled as rumors in official辟谣 (rumor-refutation) releases dated September 23 and 24, 2025. Furthermore, the official safety notices issued in late September 2025 reiterate long-standing prohibitions—not new emergency closures—and emphasize inherent risks (e.g., extreme weather, no signal, high rescue difficulty), not recent incidents.

evidence_sources.content: ‘有人在山顶冻死致北京东灵山“封山”? 真相:……上述信息均为谣言。实际上,东灵山自2019年起暂停对外开放,并停止一切旅游活动。’ — China Internet Joint Rumor Refutation Platform, published Sept 23, 2025.

‘关于严禁游客擅自进入东灵山开展穿越、攀登等活动的安全提示’ — Joint notice issued by Mentougou District authorities in late September 2025, reaffirming pre-existing closure status and risk warnings, with no mention of any 2025 fatality.
